website_summaries.verdict: Retro vibes run deep in the California VTG or Vintage by Puma. Named after the sunshine state of California, the classic tennis sneaker grew an audience in soccer-loving European countries. The affordable sneaker that became an inspiration for the Puma GV Special and the Puma G. Vilas is known for its reliable external arch support and thick rubber outsole. The EVA midsole of the vintage kicks also allows for lightweight cushioning and support.
pros: Some customers repurchased these Puma California Vintage sneakers for sentimental reasons having used the shoes in the 1980s
One user like the vintage looks of the sneaker especially its navy, black, and grey tones
A few noticed the VTG or Vintage version of the Puma California sneakers is more breathable with the use of mesh in parts of the footwear
A commenter finds the neutral colorways not overly done making them easier to style with casual clothes
Some people call it the OG of the Guillermo Vilas endorsed and designed sneakers back in the ‘80s
One commenter liked the breathability of these vintage mesh shoes with lots of perforations in the toe box
The synthetic nubuck material in the toe box gives the shoe a polished old-school sneaker look
cons: The vintage shoe looks bulky as compared to other classic Puma designs like the Puma Suede and Puma Clyde
The shoe design and colors looked a tad boring compared to other classic sneakers according to a couple of reviewers
One user says the tongue of the sneakers could get quite uncomfortable when the laces are closed tight

customer_reviews.title: Too tight especially the width!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for casual walks through the mall or near the beach, I normally wear 10.5 and ordered 11 thinking I was safe but these shoes felt like a size 9 not to mention they were way too narrow on the width! I was in pain after walking a couple of blocks! The quality and style of them are awsome but beware of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Never had a shoes that looks like it and now that I got it it looks so cool and great like I had for years you know like distressed shoes worn in all terrain experience thx puma great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roufan Nahhas

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and they are comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, but good
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I was apprehensive buying these, but was pleasantly surprised. They are a tighter fit, so if you have exceptionally wide feet, they will not fit. But otherwise, they fit me as expected and are comfortable right out of the box as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amonk

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who absolutely loved them! They are unique looking and have not seen anywhere else. He has a very narrow foot, and they fit him just right and said they were super comfortable. He highly recommends them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY-You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED Awesome shoes, fast shipping and I could not be happier with these shoes. Way better than what was pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super just.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Super in a super way, dig? Just a bit narrow, but everybody knows that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but too narrow fit. I felt like my blood was getting cut off. Wish they had wide ones...
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe with a decent fit
customer_reviews.text: Even with a semi wide foot this shoe fits pretty well, and has a comfortable insole
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Another Hot Sneaker Hot Sneaker ! Very Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets so many compliments when he wears them ! Very nice sneaker Really like these Very Happy customer 😍
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Unique kicks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking Pumas, and not many people own a pair of these unique beauties! They fit snugly but more or less as expected. A size 10 can fit into a size 10.5, but not into a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Millennial Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for stated size
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come close to fitting compared to my other shoes of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Thom S Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I get comments on these almost every day, Great purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Warren Montanye

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, but it is too narrow. Perhaps order a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tiny faux tears ruin a otherwise great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool shoe almost ruined by a failed attempt at the “torn/worn” look. The little decorative tears are not visible in the photo but when you get the shoes, you see these spots, which you think are specs of loose materials but are actually tiny faux tears. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Margery B.

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Not fitting no matter how tight I lace them up my heal slides
customer_reviews.author: ray elick

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow throughout the length shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping to use them for hacking around in but not sure they will work out since they are very snug. Shoes seem to run narrow throughout so ordering a larger size probably won't help. I will probably keep them and try to stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: td90731

customer_reviews.title: REASON WHY THEY ARE NARROW
customer_reviews.text: the reason why these shoes might feel smaller is because this is a womens shoe on the puma website, meaning the width starts at B as for all womens shoes, while mens shoes start at a D width, but these are womens shoes
customer_reviews.author: ghandy

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens California Vintage Casual Sneakers,
product_meta.description: Rock a retro look with these PUMA® California Vintage sneakers. Casual training shoes inspired by classic tennis courts and California vibes. Soft, comfortable leather and textile uppers with a perforated vamp. Foam-padded collar and tongue offer a great fit. Lace up closure at the front. Textile lining and a cushioned sockliner for enhanced comfort. EVA-midsole provides optimal cushioning and a great ride. Full-rubber outsole offers greater traction and grip. Multi-color textile PUMA® formstrip on the side panels. PUMA® California branding. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Rock a retro look with these PUMA® California Vintage sneakers.
Casual training shoes inspired by classic tennis courts and California vibes.
Soft, comfortable leather and textile uppers with a perforated vamp.
Foam-padded collar and tongue offer a great fit.

Lace up closure at the front. Textile lining and a cushioned sockliner for enhanced comfort. EVA-midsole provides optimal cushioning and a great ride. Full-rubber outsole offers greater traction and grip. Multi-color textile PUMA® formstrip on the side panels. PUMA® California branding. Imported.
